portfolio.title: Spotification
portfolio.description: Application that displays a spotify users public playlists as well as top artists and tracks within the last month, 6 months, and year of listening.

portfolio.title: Sorting Visualizer
portfolio.description: React website that provides a visualization of how Merge Sort sorts an array of randomly assigned values.

portfolio.title: Note Keeper
portfolio.description: Dynamic note keeping application created using React hooks to post notes to a list which is displayed on a board.

portfolio.title: Path Finder
portfolio.description: Path finding algorithm designed to find the shortest path between a designated start and end point using A* Search through Python to dictate which route to traverse.

portfolio.title: Connect4 AI
portfolio.description: AI created to play a perfect game of Connect4 using the Mini-Max algorithm along with alpha-beta pruning to aid in informing the AI's next move.

portfolio.title: Tindog
portfolio.description: Mock landing page created for a website designed to help your dog find the love of their life. Created using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
